publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6393 Nicola Sturgeon: Progress Towards 18 Week Referral to Treatment—That the Parliament welcomes the progress that has been made in reducing waiting times for patients; applauds the commitment, dedication and hard work of all NHS staff who have contributed to delivering significant improvements for the people of Scotland, and acknowledges that NHSScotland is on track to deliver the Scottish Government’s challenging whole-journey waiting time target of 18 weeks by the end 2011. Supported by: Shona Robison*
